name: Hunger Maze
description:
Hunger Maze is first-person horror game prototype inspired by pac-man. I created it to showcase my work as a game developer and designer. 

It was entirely made with pre-made licensed assets, with the exception of programming and desing which were made by me.
I hope you enjoy this short prototype, you can comment on the page or contact me if you want to share your opinion!

Thank you,

Ramon Albino.
